Sonagiri：A mountain district in Ceylon．King Mahācūli Mahātissa once worked in a sugar mill there for three years in order to earn money wherewith to give alms （Mhv．xxxiv．4）．Near Sonnagiri was the Pipphalī-vihāra （VibhA．439）．

According to the Mahāvamsatīkā （MT．624； see also Mhv．Trs．238，n．1），Sonnagiri was part of the Ambatthakola-range．
